seo.title: Ayyukan Kula da Masana'antu | PLC SCADA DCS Shigarwa & Kulawa | Powerton Engineering India
seo.description: Cikakkun ayyukan kula da masana'antu da injiniyan lantarki a duk faɗin Indiya - PLC SCADA DCS shigarwa, ƙaddamar da rukunin kulawa, daidaita NABL, gwajin kayan aiki, tallafin fasaha na 24/7, hanyoyin sarrafa kansa na musamman, horo, da ayyukan Solar EPC. Kamfanin da aka tabbatar da ISO yana hidimar masana'antar harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai & gas, masana'antu. Ƙwararre a cikin Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider automation. Ana samun shawarwari kyauta.
seo.keywords: ayyukan kula da masana'antu Indiya, ayyukan shigarwa na PLC, SCADA commissioning, DCS shigarwa, shigar da rukunin kulawa, haɗin tsarin sarrafa kansa, ayyukan ƙaddamar da wutar lantarki, kayan aiki calibration NABL, ayyukan gwaji na kayan aiki, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu, ayyukan kula da masana'antu, tallafin fasaha na sarrafa kansa 24/7, hanyoyin sarrafa kansa na musamman, shigar da rukunin MCC, PCC commissioning, shigar VFD, ayyukan shirye-shiryen HMI, kwasa-kwasan horo na sarrafa kansa, horo na PLC SCADA, ayyukan solar EPC India, shigar da makamashi mai sabuntawa, ayyukan ba da shawarwari na sarrafa kansa, ƙirar tsarin kulawa, ayyukan injiniyan lantarki, ayyukan sarrafa maɓalli, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu, hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu, shigar da IoT na masana'antu, Ayyukan Masana'antu 4.0, ayyukan kula da hasashe, saitin sa ido na nesa, ayyukan ƙaura na SCADA, ayyukan haɓaka DCS, gyaran rukunin kulawa, sarrafa zamani na sarrafa kansa, ayyukan ƙirar lantarki, shigar da rarraba wutar lantarki, saitin cibiyar kula da motoci, gudanar da aikin sarrafa kansa, ɗan kwangilar lantarki na masana'antu, shigar da kula da masana'antu, ayyukan sarrafa harhada magunguna, ƙaddamar da tashar wutar lantarki, ayyukan sarrafa mai da iskar gas, sarrafa masana'antar kemikal, sarrafa ruwa, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu

installation-commissioning.plc-dcs: Shigar da Mai Kula da Ma'ana Mai Shirye-shirye/Rarraba Tsarin Kulawa

calibration-testing.nabl-certified: Hukumar Ba da Takardar Shaida ta Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje da Gyara ta Kasa

custom-solutions.mcc-panels: Keɓaɓɓun Rukunin Cibiyar Kula da Mota

consultation-training.plc-programming: Horar da Shirye-shiryen Mai Kula da Ma'ana Mai Shirye-shirye
consultation-training.isa-certified: Tsarin Kayan Aiki da Ƙungiyar Automation sun ba da izini

supply-chain-management.authorized-distributors: Masu Rarraba da Aka Ba da izini

solar-epc.mnre-approved: Zane-zane da Ma'aikatar Sabbin Makamashi da Sabuntawa ta Amince da su

descriptions.installation-commissioning: Ƙwararrun sabis na shigarwa da ƙaddamarwa don rukunin lantarki, PLC, tsarin SCADA, da kayan aikin masana'antu.
descriptions.calibration-testing: Sabis na gyara da gwaji na daidaito wanda Hukumar Ba da Takardar Shaida ta Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje da Gyara ta Kasa ta amince da shi don matsa lamba, zafin jiki, kayan aikin kwarara, da tsarin kula, tare da cikakken sabis na kulawa na rigakafi da gaggawa don tsarin lantarki da kayan aikin sarrafa kansa na masana'antu.
descriptions.technical-support: Ayyukan tallafi na fasaha na 24/7 tare da gano cututtuka ta hanyar nesa, warware matsalar a wurin, da amsa gaggawa.
descriptions.custom-solutions: Keɓaɓɓun hanyoyin injiniya da aka keɓance don buƙatun masana'antu na musamman, gami da keɓaɓɓun rukunin MCC, tsarin sarrafa kansa, da hanyoyin sarrafa tsari.
descriptions.consultation-training: Ƙwararrun shawarwari na fasaha da shirye-shiryen horarwa na hannu don shirye-shiryen PLC, haɓaka HMI, da sarrafa kansa na masana'antu.
descriptions.supply-chain-management: Cikakken gudanar da sarkar samar da kayayyaki don kayan aikin lantarki da kayan gyara. Cibiyar sadarwa ta masu rarraba da aka ba da izini tana tabbatar da sassa na gaske.
descriptions.solar-epc: Cikakkun sabis na injiniya, samarwa, da gine-gine na hasken rana don ayyukan 1kW zuwa 1MW+. Garanti na aiki na shekaru 25 tare da ƙirar da Ma'aikatar Sabbin Makamashi da Sabuntawa ta amince da su.

technicalSupport.overview: Ayyukan tallafi na fasaha na 24/7 don warware matsalar, taimako na nesa, da tallafi a wurin tare da saurin amsawa ga duk tsarin lantarki da sarrafa kansa.
benefits: Samuwar tallafi na fasaha na 24/7
Ayyukan gano cututtuka ta hanyar nesa da warware matsala
Taimakon gaggawa a wurin idan an buƙata
Saurin lokacin amsawa ga batutuwa masu mahimmanci
Cikakkun warware matsala da bibiyar

installationCommissioning.overview: Cikakkun ayyukan shigarwa da ƙaddamarwa don tsarin sarrafa kansa na masana'antu, rukunin lantarki, da kayan aiki tare da ƙwararrun takaddun shaida da gwaji.
benefits: Ƙwararren shigarwa ta ƙwararrun injiniyoyi
Cikakken gwaji da ƙaddamar da tsarin
Cikakkun takardu da takardar shaida
Horarwa da tallafin canja wuri
Taimakon bayan shigarwa da garanti

calibrationTesting.overview: Sabis na gyara da gwaji na daidaito wanda Hukumar Ba da Takardar Shaida ta Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje da Gyara ta Kasa ta amince da shi don kayan aikin matsa lamba, zafin jiki, kwarara, da tsarin kula, tare da cikakken sabis na kulawa na rigakafi da gaggawa don rage lokacin tsayawa da tabbatar da ingantaccen aiki.
benefits: Hukumar Ba da Takardar Shaida ta Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje da Gyara ta Kasa ta amince da sabis na gyara
Gwajin daidaito mai inganci zuwa ±0.25%
Tabbatar da bin ka'idoji tare da ka'idojin kasa da kasa
Cikakkun takardun shaida da takardu
Tsare-tsaren gyara na yau da kullum da kulawa
Tsare-tsaren kulawa na rigakafi da ke hana gazawa
Gyarawa ta gaggawa cikin sauri
Component replacement and system upgrades
Planned maintenance to minimize downtime
Comprehensive system diagnostics and reporting

customSolutions.overview: Keɓaɓɓun hanyoyin injiniya da aka keɓance don buƙatun masana'antu na musamman, gami da keɓaɓɓun rukunin MCC, tsarin sarrafa kansa, da hanyoyin sarrafa tsari waɗanda ke magance takamaiman ƙalubalen aiki.
benefits: Keɓaɓɓun rukunin MCC don takamaiman buƙatu
Sarrafa kai tsaye don aikace-aikace na musamman
Cikakkun hanyoyin magance matsala daga ƙira zuwa aiwatarwa
Ƙirƙirar don ƙalubalen aiki na musamman
Cikakken haɗin tsarin da haɓakawa

consultationTraining.overview: Ƙwararrun shawarwari na fasaha da shirye-shiryen horarwa na hannu don shirye-shiryen PLC, haɓaka HMI, da sarrafa kansa na masana'antu waɗanda ke haɓaka ƙwarewar fasaha da tabbatar da canja wurin ilimi.
benefits: Ƙwararren horo a cikin shirye-shiryen Mai Kula da Ma'ana Mai Shirye-shirye
Shawarwari a cikin ƙirar tsarin da gine-gine
Tsarin Kayan Aiki da Ƙungiyar Automation sun ba da izini
Bita na aiki da ƙwarewar hannu
Ci gaba da tallafin fasaha da jagora
technologies: Shirye-shiryen Mai Kula da Ma'ana Mai Shirye-shirye
industries: Masu ba da sabis na fasaha

supplyChainManagement.overview: Cikakken gudanar da sarkar samar da kayayyaki don kayan aikin lantarki da kayan gyara. Cibiyar sadarwa ta masu rarraba da aka ba da izini tana tabbatar da sassa na gaske kuma tana kula da ci gaba da aiki tare da isar da sauri.
benefits: Sassa na gaske ne kawai daga masu rarraba da aka ba da izini
Garanti na shekara 1 akan duk abubuwan da aka kawo
Sabis ɗin isar da sauri don buƙatu na gaggawa
Cikakken gudanar da kaya da samuwan
Ingantattun hanyoyin samar da kayayyaki da sayayya

solarEpc.overview: Cikakkun sabis na injiniya, samarwa, da gine-gine na hasken rana don ayyukan 1kW zuwa 1MW+. Garanti na aiki na shekaru 25 tare da ƙirar da Ma'aikatar Sabbin Makamashi da Sabuntawa ta amince da su da cikakken taimako na haɗin grid.
benefits: Zane da injiniyan da Ma'aikatar Sabbin Makamashi da Sabuntawa ta amince da su
Ƙarfin aikin daga 1kW zuwa 1MW+
Garanti mai fa'ida na shekaru 25
Cikakken haɗin grid da taimakon auna raga
Cikakken sabis daga gudanar da aiki zuwa ƙaddamarwa
